class_notes:
This course will be taught entirely online and will meet synchronously on Fridays; remaining course content will be delivered asynchronously.


This course introduces political science graduate students to the study of international relations.  It covers topics such as international relations theory, war, trade, international cooperation, decision-making, and others.  Enrollment is by permission only for students who are not political science graduate students.
sections: Class Nbr: 3744, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 11:20a-2:15p, Instructor: D. Reiter, Status: Open
